meta.name: description
meta.content: Generate secure random passwords directly in your web browser using this Java applet.

ul.li: You must have Java 1.5 or later installed, configured, and enabled to use the password generator in your web browser.
The password length, and characters that can appear in the password can be set in Edit -> Preferences.
Preferences are not remembered between visits and page reloads.
This applet is part of the com.Ostermiller.util Java Utilities
A command line and a Java library version of this program is also available.
The source code for this applet is available.
